docs.lead_paragraph: It's graduation party season, which means social host laws that hold parents responsible for teenage drinking are back in the news. Last week, two Harvard Medical School professors were arrested because teenagers were found drinking at their daughter's graduation party, though they said they did not see the alcohol.

headline.main: Should Parents Be Jailed When Kids Drink?

docs.abstract: Is it better to allow teenagers to drink at home than worry about them driving drunk?
docs.snippet: Is it better to allow teenagers to drink at home than worry about them driving drunk?

docs.lead_paragraph: Pancreatic cancer will be diagnosed in about 42,000 Americans this year, and some 35,000 will die of it. What can be done to treat pancreatic cancer, or prevent recurrences after treatment? Readers recently posted questions about pancreatic cancer treatment and prevention on the Consults blog. Here, Dr. Eileen O'Reilly of Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center in New York responds.

headline.main: Expert Answers on Pancreatic Cancer Treatment

docs.abstract: Dr. Eileen O'Reilly responds to readers asking about the treatment and prevention of pancreatic cancer.
docs.snippet: Dr. Eileen O'Reilly responds to readers asking about the treatment and prevention of pancreatic cancer.

docs.lead_paragraph: As Congress tried to reduce spending, more lung cancer patients received chemotherapy treatments.

headline.seo: Doctors Recouped Cuts in Medicare Pay, Study Finds
headline.main: Doctors Recouped Cuts in Medicare Pay, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Doctors Recouped Cuts in Medicare Pay, Study Finds

docs.snippet: As Congress tried to reduce spending, more lung cancer patients received chemotherapy treatments.

docs.lead_paragraph: Obesity and depression often go hand in hand. But does being obese make people depressed, or can depression cause weight gain?

headline.main: Exploring the Links Between Depression and Weight Gain

docs.abstract: Depression and obesity often go hand in hand, but does obesity lead to depression or vice versa?
docs.snippet: Depression and obesity often go hand in hand, but does obesity lead to depression or vice versa?

docs.lead_paragraph: Treatments designed to block abnormalities that spur tumor growth have shown promise, but they have also fallen short in recent studies.

headline.seo: ‘Targeted’ Cancer Therapies Bring Hope and Failure
headline.main: Therapies for Cancer Bring Hope and Failure
headline.print_headline: Therapies For Cancer Bring Hope And Failure

docs.snippet: Treatments designed to block abnormalities that spur tumor growth have shown promise, but they have also fallen short in recent studies.
